Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Lifestream
Punchline: A plugin to speed up Aethernet travel and World changing.
Description:
- One click to teleport to any world or aethernet destination
- Click on aetheryte shards inside zone map to teleport to them
Changelog:
- DC transfer has been updated and enabled
- Presumably fixed a bug where character would not initiate world visit after DC transfer that would end up on an adjusted world
- Fixed an issue where character would try to teleport to not unlocked gateway
- Teleport to apartment function fully updated
